description: Creates or updates the specified firewall rule. During update, the firewall rule with the specified name will be replaced with this new firewall rule.

firewall_rule_name.description: The name of the firewall rule to create or update.

parameters.description: Parameters supplied to create or update the firewall rule.

properties.description: The firewall rule properties to use when creating a new firewall rule.

subscription_id.description: Get subscription credentials which uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

resource_group_name.description: The name of the Azure resource group.

account_name.description: The name of the Data Lake Analytics account.
